[DESCRIPTION]
As Sam Fisher - Single squad to combat terrorism , fill dangerous missions throughout the world. Sneaking , combining , waiting for the right moment only - these are the features of this excellent production.

Changes in relation to the first part, concerning the gameplay include a new way of disarming explosives , and other traps , as well as expanded suit movements Sam Fisher . A huge plus is also a Multiplayer option .

Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory is the third part of the highly acclaimed series of action games , developed by the company Ubisoft . This time the agent Sam Fisher , which controls the actions of the player , must prevent the outbreak of armed conflict on a global scale. Compared to earlier disclosures from the series creators decided to introduce a number of innovations , including primarily non-linear storyline , expanded melee system , and additional modes of play .

Tom Clancy 's Splinter Cell 4 is the fourth episode of the series dedicated agent Sam Fisher . This time, however ( in theory ) evil prevails over good. Traditionally, the game produced and released the company UbiSoft .
